verses.verse: Out of the <S%H4615>depths<s%> I have <S%H7121>cried<s%> to <S%H3068>you,<s%> Yahweh.
<S%H136>Lord,<s%> <S%H8085>hear<s%> my <S%H6963>voice.<s%> Let your <S%H241>ears<s%> be <S%H7183>attentive<s%> to the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of my <S%H8469>petitions.<s%>
If <S%H3050>you,<s%> Yah, kept a <S%H8104>record<s%> of <S%H5771>sins,<s%> <S%H136>Lord,<s%> who could <S%H5975>stand?<s%>
But there is <S%H5547>forgiveness<s%> with <S%H3372>you,<s%> therefore you are feared.
I <S%H6960>wait<s%> for <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> My <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H6960>waits.<s%> I <S%H3176>hope<s%> in his <S%H1697>word.<s%>
My <S%H5315>soul<s%> longs for the <S%H136>Lord<s%> more than <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> long for the <S%H1242>morning;<s%> more than <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> for the <S%H1242>morning.<s%>
<S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3176>hope<s%> in <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> for with <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> there is loving <S%H2617>kindness.<s%> With him is <S%H7235>abundant<s%> <S%H6304>redemption.<s%>
